name: 5 Sleeps Until Dawn
description:
My first completed Twine game! Ever! Wow. I hope you like it! It has been a learning experience, even just doing basic stuff.

Calm multigender witch dating on the moon. Made for ILUJAM 2 in June.

A prequel to another longer & depthier twine story still in writing.

UPDATE: Crashes instantly on some firefox builds. Trying to fix it... don't know if it's my fault or not. Safari or Internet Explorer works fine!

UPDATE 2: Hopefully no longer crashes on firefox.
